thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 2 of 530
thread.title: Sami Glover

author: Sami Glover
title: Sami Glover
text:
My contact lense order was filled very quickly. I did have to follow-up to request my rebate form but it was provided immediately.
I also ordered glasses on line which I have never done before. I decided to go the cheap route because every time I get glasses it seems I can never actually see out of them. OptiContacts called me a few times to tweak my order. My only criticism is that the tweaks could have been handled in fewer calls and issuing a proper credit was initially overlooked. At the end of the day, customer service responds practically immediately, the billing issue was solved, and I received glasses that I can actually see out of that cost less than I have ever spent. Overall it was a very good experience.
